About Me

BIO

Hello, I am GD,
I am a Coder, Engineer, TCS-Intern,
Looking for teams to join as Developer.
I love Computers and latest Technologies.

TCS Intern

Worked on Full-Stack JavaScript Development.

I Completed an Internship in Tata Consultancy Services, for 3 months.
I worked on latest Technologies like Full-Stack JavaScript Development, in MERN Stack as MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS. Learned Git-Version Control System, Bootstrap, Software Development Life Cycle. Website Hosting platform Heroku-MLab.

BE from Mumbai-University

Specialization in Information Technology

I completed Engineering with CGPA 8/10, from DY-Patil's RAIT College.
I studied Data Structures & Algorithms Analysis, Open Source Technologies, Object-Oriented Programming, Mathematics, Database Management System, Machine Learning, Computer Networks, Operating Systems.
Also, I practiced Competitive Coding on LeetCode and System Design.

Student at StackOverflow.

Self-helped & Online learning Student.

StackOverflow is a platform to Ask/Answer/Discuss/Learn/Explain about technologies, Coding practices, code-review, Errors-in-code.
I spend my leisure time on it, to read and solve others' doubts, which gives reputation points if answer is helpful.
My StackOverflow and AskUbuntu total reputation is 1000+ points.

Regards GD.
